messages.subject: OT: Louisville, Colorado?
messages.msgSnippet: My husband is up for a promotion in Louisville, Colorado and I am wondering if anyone is from that area.  We would be moving from Florida and I might not have
messages.messageBody:
My husband is up for a promotion in Louisville, Colorado and I am
wondering if anyone is from that area. We would be moving from
Florida and I might not have a chance to visit before he accepts or
declines the job (I am 30 weeks pregnant). My husband LOVES it there
and has been there many times, but I have never been out west- only
traveled north and south.

Is there an unschooling community in that area? What else can anyone
tell me about the area-positive and negative?

Please feel free to e-mail me off list.

Thanks! Jeanette
